sqls.gzbd: select split(f.yjbjjz,'[+]') from fund f where f.jjlx='债券型'
sqls.kernal: select to_date(substr(delistdate,1,instr(delistdate,"T")-1)) from kzzlb where delistdate is not null and delistdate!='' and delistdate!='-'
sqls.test: select to_date(substr(DELISTDATE,1,instr(DELISTDATE,"T")-1)) as delistdate ,unix_timestamp(substr(DELISTDATE,1,instr(DELISTDATE,"T")-1), 'yyyy-MM-dd'); from kzzlb where DELISTDATE is not null and DELISTDATE!='' and DELISTDATE!='-'
sqls.kernal_inx: select cast(i.percent as decimal(26,8)),i.rowkey as rowkey from index_inx i where i.percent is not null
sqls.movingAverages: select * from ( select f.fundcode as fundcode ,n.FSRQ as fsrq ,n.LJJZ as ljjz, row_number() over(partition by f.fundcode order by n.FSRQ desc) rank from fund f left join netval n on f.fundcode=substr(n.rowkey,1,instr(n.rowkey,"_")-1) where f.jjlx='混合型' ) a where a.rank<5
